MacroOp.Name: OMNI_TERMINATE
MacroOp.Brief: Defines the underlying terminate function to call.
MacroOp.Description: This macro is the underlying function called in the event the library needs to terminate (i.e. an error occurred on destruction, etc.). For more information see @h omni/exception.hpp @h
MacroOp.Synopsis: If not defined, will define the macro to be std::terminate unless OMNI_NO_TERMINATE is defined.
